web_snippets: About Robert Moss and Active Dreaming ... A former lecturer in ancient history at the Australian National University, he is a best-selling novelist, journalist ...
Robert Moss, a former professor of ancient history and creator of Active Dreaming, is a best-selling novelist, poet, and scholar.
The Department of Chemistry and Chemical Biology is sad to announce the passing of Emeritus Professor Robert Moss on Monday, November 27, 2017.
